data.comment: The match has started at Philips Stadion.
Eindhoven have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 16, Goal! Eran Zahavi gives Eindhoven a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Jordan Teze is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, Jochem Kamphuis blows to end the first-half.
The away team has substituted Andrei Ratiu with Pascu. Aleksandar Rankovic is thus making his first change.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Philipp Max is replacing Mohammed Ihattaren for the home team.
In the minute 46, Roger Schmidt (Eindhoven) is making a second substitution, with Chukwunonso Madueke replacing Donyell Malen.
Goal! Eindhoven extend their lead to 2-0 through Chukwunonso Madueke.
That's a fine assist from Eran Zahavi.
In the minute 60, Aleksandar Rankovic is making the team's second substitution at Philips Stadion with Jonas Arweiler replacing Samy Bourard.
Den Haag make their third substitution with Nikos Karelis replacing Michiel Kramer.
Richard Ledezma is replacing Mauro Junior for Eindhoven at Philips Stadion.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced John Goossens with Ilay Elmkies. This is the fourth substitution made today by Aleksandar Rankovic.
The away team replace Lassana Faye with Bilal Ould-Chikh.
Nikos Karelis (Den Haag) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 84, Goal! Eindhoven extend their lead to 3-0 through Ryan Thomas.
Richard Ledezma instrumental with a fine assist.
Luis Felipe is on a sub for Ryan Thomas for Eindhoven.
In the minute 88, Ismael Saibari is on a sub for Mario Gotze for Eindhoven.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-0.
Great finish from Chukwunonso Madueke to give Eindhoven a 4-0 lead.
